item.description: Весна (2008) Text Дельфин on the clip below and (his memories of) the 1980 Olympics on Together with Дельфин, we remember the clip “Весна” (Sports.ru, 2020). Надя (2014) Text 520 (2018) Text Bonus: Без Нас (Without Us, 2008); more music on Spotify.

item.title: Adidas
item.description: Why Slavs wear Adidas (Life of Boris, 2016, 2 m) Also, check out this Eastern European vs. Life of Boris – Adidas Tracksuit (Eastern European, 2018, 3 m).
